p: To a weighed quantity containing 16.1 mg of hempseed extract, 10 mL of methanol was added as the sample solution; this was repeated three times. The sample solution was analyzed according to the above-mentioned HPLCâ€“DAD chromatographic conditions and the peak area was recorded. A standard curve was prepared using cannabisin A (CA) and N- trans-caffeoyltyramine (NC) as standard compounds, and the total content of the identified compounds was calculated.
